content.description:
Start same as Giv'er onions and keep moving left on sharp crimps towards pounce method. Then go straight up and top out left.

Upper right stacks. Follow path between the pillar and the chamber.
uneven rocks. bring pads

Start on the obvious rail and move left into a gaston then go straight up all the way. Can also be done with power kinda dyno and skip some moves.

Upper right stacks. If you go up the trail between the chamber and the pillar, you'll get to it. Close to the base of the rock wall.
uneven rock situation. Need few pads. Or just send it.

Turquoise - Green Onions and Ham V6ish 
Start as for Hamstrong but after the first move traverse right into the start of Giver Onions. Adds a little bit of pump and trickery to that problem. FA Justin Friend

Purple - Hamstrong V4 Start seated with your left hand on the big shelf and right hand on a poor sloper. Do a tricky first move and then up and left via the crimps on the face. FA Devon Holcroft

Giv'er Onions boulder. Up the trail between the pillar and the chamber
pads

Purple - Hamstrong V4 Start seated with your left hand on the big shelf and right hand on a poor sloper. Do a tricky first move and then up and left via the crimps on the face. FA Devon Holcroft 

Turquoise - Green Onions and Ham V6ish Start as for Hamstrong but after the first move traverse right into the start of Giver Onions. Adds a little bit of pump and trickery to that problem. FA Justin Friend

On Giv'er Onions boulder. Go up the trail between the pillar and the chamber.
pads

right feet on obvious step, left hand on good hold left of the arete and compress with right hand, compress up to right side ledge. ​Pounce Method - beta video​​​ Upper Right Stacks. head up the trail between the pillar and the chamber.

super fun steep arete. This boulder is located in the upper right region of The Stacks/Hope BC. To get there walk past the big, steep boulder that is home to Limelight. Take the first trail on your left and walk uphill for 5 minutes. Pads
Red - Pounce Method V7 / Yellow - Gillette V4 / Blue - Giv'er Onions V4
